sentences.en: a live satellite link-up with the conference
sentences.cn: 对会议的卫星实况转播

sentences.en: Certainly, Andreessen didn't think up using hypertext to link Internet documents.
sentences.cn: 当然,用超文本链接因特网文档并不是安德烈亚森发明的.

sentences.en: He commanded that roads be built to link castles across the land.
sentences.cn: 他下令修建连接各地城堡的道路。

sentences.en: He suggested a link between class size and test results of seven-year-olds.
sentences.cn: 他认为7岁大的学生的测试分数和班级的规模有关系。

sentences.en: He walked with her, linking arms (= putting his arm around her arm ).
If you've forgotten your login ID, click this link.
sentences.cn: 如果忘记了自己的注册账号就点击此链接。

sentences.en: Police suspect there may be a link between the two murders.
sentences.cn: 警方怀疑那两桩凶杀案可能有关联。

sentences.en: Police think the murders are linked.
sentences.cn: 警方认为这些谋杀案互有关联。

sentences.en: Send an email to the above address to report a broken link (= a link that is not working properly ).
sentences.cn: 如发现链接失败，请发送电子邮件至上述地址告知。

sentences.en: She was my only link with the past.
sentences.cn: 她是我与过去的唯一纽带。

sentences.en: Something must have gone wrong with the satellite link.
sentences.cn: 卫星连接一定出了毛病。

sentences.en: That link is an established medical fact.
sentences.cn: 那一关联是已经证实的医学事实。

sentences.en: the link between drug use and crime
sentences.cn: 吸毒和犯罪之间的联系

sentences.en: The new road schemes include a link between Chelmsford and the M25.
sentences.cn: 新的道路规划中包括了一条切姆斯福德与M25号高速公路的连接线。

sentences.en: The signals are sent by satellite link.
sentences.cn: 信号通过人造卫星链路发出。

sentences.en: There is an unquestionable link between job losses and deteriorating services.
sentences.cn: 人员的裁减和服务质量的下降之间显然是有联系的。

sentences.en: There is convincing evidence of a link between exposure to sun and skin cancer.
sentences.cn: 有可靠证据表明日光曝晒与皮肤癌之间有联系。

sentences.en: There may be a link between madness and creativity.
sentences.cn: 在疯狂和创造力之间也许有着某种联系。

sentences.en: They have yet to break the link with the trade unions.
sentences.cn: 他们还必须断绝与工会组织的联系。

words.tran_cn: 连接的；联合的；显示连环遗传的
连接；结合；联接；联动装置

phrases.tran_cn: 通信线路；通信连接装置
连接杆；可拆链环；连接环节；联接链节；连接片
数据（自动）传输器；数据（自动）中继器
链接分析；连接分析；链分析
推定存在于人猿与人类之间的过渡动物；缺少的一环
无线电线路；无线电联系

trans.tran_cn: 联系，连接物，纽带，交通路线，超文本链接，（链状物）圈
trans.tran_en: one of the rings in a chain

trans.tran_cn: 使联系在一起，连接，声称…有关系，挽住
trans.tran_en: to physically join two or more things, people, or places
to physically join two or more things, people, or places
